topic.title: RENAL VEIN TUMOUR INDICATOR FOR PAEDIATRIC KIDNEY
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether there is evidence of Tumour thrombus (a rare complication of many solid cancers) in the renal vein for Paediatric Kidney during a Children Teenagers and Young Adults Cancer Care Spell.
